articlesectionclassifier.classifying
Class ArticleSectionClassifier

java.lang.Object
  articlesectionclassifier.classifying.ArticleSectionClassifier

public class ArticleSectionClassifier
extends java.lang.Object

This is the central classification class. It can be used to classify text sections (with or without titles) with a variety of inputs and outputs. The general way to use it is to create an instance of the class and then call one of the classifyText methods. You can make repeated calls to these methods and the results will be provided by a ClassificationResult object as well as by the method getLastClassificationResult().
